name: 极限生存/Tough Survival
description:
Tough Survival is a battle royale strategic shooting game made by a Chinese team. It have large-size maps, fine and clear details, smooth operation and reaction, and battles between 100 players and it is a great and impressive world!
First of all, Tough Survival is a web game with low pc requirement. You will have smooth game experience even with ordinary office pc or home pc over years.
The next, you will find there is an extremely simplified install file. No need to wait for a long time, you can download and install it, then enter the game in a minute!
Ofc all talked above is just basic issues, let’s move to some key points.
Art quality and details: Tough Survival is carefully built by a lead art team from China, simulating the real environment using elements like buildings, warehouses, grass, cornfields, hills, jungles and etc. in maps of tens of square kilometers. All clear details make real sensory experiences for players.
Game features: there are tens of weapons and accessories for you to choose; Different supplies and medicine supports fierce battles; Vehicles can works as tools for riding instead of walk to save time, an can be shelters to protect you. Beside, most powerful use of vehicle can be like weapons! Run over your opponents and make deadly strike.
Gameplays: unprecedented scale for 100 players to compete together, using variegated landforms, weapons, vehicles and items, ambush, strike or confront directly, you can find it is extremely excited!
TOUGH BATTLEGOUND, chicken dinners waiting for you!!
